ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "agent": vars.agentToCallDisplayName, "type": "Agent Task Request", "id": vars.agentTaskRequest.id, "sessionId": vars.agentTaskRequest.sessionId, "status": "new", "timestamp": (now() >> 'UTC') as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'"}, "message": vars.agentTaskRequest.message.parts[0].text }

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "agent": vars.agentToCallDisplayName, "type": "Agent Task Response", "id": vars.agentTaskResponse.id, "sessionId": vars.agentTaskResponse.sessionId, "status": vars.agentTaskResponse.status.state, "timestamp": (now() >> 'UTC') as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'"}, "message": vars.agentTaskResponse.artifacts[0].parts[0].text }

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "agent": p('agent.name'), "type": "Agent Task Request", "id": vars.task_id, "sessionId": vars.sessionId, "status": "new", "timestamp": (now() >> 'UTC') as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'"}, "message": vars.userPrompt }

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "agent": p('agent.name'), "type": "Agent Task Response", "id": vars.task_id, "sessionId": vars.sessionId, "status": "completed", "timestamp": (now() >> 'UTC') as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'"}, "message": payload.response }
